module RemRingModule

type RemRingType
    integer(8) :: modulus
    contains
    procedure :: sum => RemRing_sum
    procedure :: sub => RemRing_sub
    procedure :: prod => RemRing_prod
    procedure :: div => RemRing_div
    procedure :: inv => RemRing_inv
end type RemRingType

contains

这 parts for the procedures: sum, sub, prod, div, 和 inv的函数.

然后, the functions definitions, like上面 the RemRing_inv函数，以及其他 functions. For example:

function RemRing_sum(this,a_,b_) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in) :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a_, b_
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( (a_ + b_ + this%modulus), this%modulus )
end function RemRing_sum 

注意 here added modulus then mod, according to the Java code's logic. similar for the sub function:

  function RemRing_sub(this,a_,b_) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in) :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a_, b_
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( (a_ - b_ + this%modulus), this%modulus )
  end function

    class(RemRingType), intent(in) :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a_, b_
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( a_ * b_, this%modulus )
 end function

 div: 

 function RemRing_div(this, a_, b_) result(res) 
    class(RemRingType), intent(in) :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a_, b_
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( a_ * this%inv(b_), this%modulus )

thus, the procedures can be 定义 without需要 to pass, but I think 默认的 is that the first argument is the object. thus the functions are declared with the "class(RemRingType), intent(in) :: this"作为 the first argument. 这是 okay. 总结 the full translation:

首先, the module 代码:

module RemReverseMod
   implicit none
   type RemRingType
      integer(8) :: modulus
      contains
         procedure :: sum => RemR_sum
         procedure :: sub => RemR_sub
         procedure :: prod => RemR_prod
         procedure :: div => RemR_div
         procedure :: inv => RemR_inv
   end type
contains

 function RemR_sum( this, a, b ) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( a + b + this%modulus, this%modulus )
 end function RemR_sum

 function RemR_sub( this, a, b ) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( a - b + this%modulus, this%modulus )
 end function RemR_sub

 function RemR_prod( this, a, b) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( a*b, this%modulus )
 end function RemR_prod

 function RemR_div( this,a,b ) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
    integer(8)  :: res
    res = mod( a * this%inv(b), this%modulus )
 end function RemR_div

 function RemR_inv( this, a ) result( res )
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a
    integer(8) :: res

    integer(8) :: a_var, b_var, u, v
    integer(8) :: t, z, tmp
    
    a_var  = a
    b_var  = this%modulus
    u = 1
    v = 0
    
    do while ( b_var > 0 ) t = a_var / b_var
        a_var = a_var  - t * b_var 
        u = u - t*v 
        
        ! swap a and b
        z = a_var 
        a_var = b_var
        b_var = z
        
        ! swap u and v
        z = u
        u = v 
        v = z
    end do

    res = mod(u, this%modulus )
 end function RemR_inv

end module RemReverseMod

 function RemRing_inv( this, a ) result (res)

    class(RemRingType), intent(in) :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a
    integer(8) :: res

    integer(8) :: b_var, a_var, u, v, t, z, tmp
    
    a_var = a
    b_var = this%modulus
    u = 1
    v = 0

    do while ( b_var >0 )
    
        t = a_var / b_var
        a_var = a_var - t * b_var  ! a_var is remainder (a_var =a-old minus ...)
        u = u - t * v
        
        ! Swap for next iteration
        z = a_var
        a_var = b_var
        b_var = z
        
        ! swap u and v
        z = u
        u = v
        v = z
    end do
    
    res = mod(u, this%modulus)
    
 end function RemRing_inv

type RemRingType
    integer(8) :: modulus
    contains

    procedure :: sub => RemRing_sub

    procedure :: div => RemRing_div

end type RemRingType

end function RemRing_sum

 module RemRingModule

    procedure, pass :: sum => sum_ = 这的语法可能 correct.

 等等.

 but also 要注意, passing the object for the procedures.

在 FORTRAN的 derived types, the pass()选项 specifies if the first argument is the object. 如果 the pointer 默认 the first argument is the implied 对象 instance.

 thus, the procedures can be 定义 without需要 to pass, but I think 默认的 is that the first argument is the object.

 thus the functions are declared with the "class(RemRingType), intent(in) :: this"作为 the first argument.

 这是 okay.

总结 the full translation:

首先, the module 代码:

module RemReverseMod
   implicit none
   type RemRingType
      integer(8) :: modulus
      contains
         procedure :: sum => RemR_sum
         procedure :: sub => RemR_sub
         procedure :: prod => RemR_prod
         procedure :: div => RemR_div
         procedure :: inv => RemR_inv
   end type
contains

 function RemR_sum( this, a, b ) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( a + b + this%modulus, this%modulus )
 end function RemR_sum

 function RemR_sub( this, a, b ) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( a - b + this%modulus, this%modulus )
 end function RemR_sub

 function RemR_prod( this, a, b) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
    integer(8) :: res
    res = mod( a*b, this%modulus )
 end function RemR_prod

 function RemR_div( this,a,b ) result(res)
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a, b
    integer(8)  :: res
    res = mod( a * this%inv(b), this%modulus )
 end function RemR_div

 function RemR_inv( this, a ) result( res )
    class(RemRingType), intent(in)  :: this
    integer(8), intent(in) :: a
    integer(8) :: res

    integer(8) :: a_var, b_var, u, v
    integer(8) :: t, z, tmp
    
    a_var  = a
    b_var  = this%modulus
    u = 1
    v = 0
    
    do while ( b_var > 0 )
        t = a_var / b_var
        a_var = a_var  - t * b_var 
        u = u - t*v 
        
        ! swap a and b
        z = a_var 
        a_var = b_var
        b_var = z
        
        ! swap u and v
        z = u
        u = v 
        v = z
    end do

    res = mod(u, this%modulus )
 end function RemR_inv

end module RemReverseMod

然后, the main program:

 program main

 implicit none

 character(len=256) :: s
 integer(8) :: test
  
 read(*, '(a)' ) s ! read the input string
 print *, achar( ichar( s(1:1) ) +1 )

 end program main 

注意 that the main program does not use the RemRing module. 故不需要 an use statement.

但是 在 FORTRAN中， if the module is in the same file, then ordering matters: the module must appear before any referencing programs.

因此， the complete code 是上面  two parts together.

最后, 确保函数的各参数被正确命名, 比如 在 the division function, the a and b parameters.

 the inv function的 input parameter is the function arguments (the parent is the first this argument,然后是a).

 the code should compile and work.

 注意, 在 FORTRAN, 内部 variables 需要 explicit declaration.

 the main program's functionality is to read a string and print the first character +1,这 是 straightforward.

 the RemRing module 是 more complex but implements the functionality as per the java code.
